data.title: Chicago Board of Elections
data.text:
Not registered to vote? Recently moved or changed your name and need to update your registration?

Click here for to register to vote or change your address/name

Curious about your voting details? Our 'Your Voter Information' tool is here to help! Simply enter your voter registration information to find your precinct polling place, verify your voter registration, check the status of your vote by mail application, and more. It's a one-stop-shop for all your personal voting information.

Click here to access your voter information

Want to cast your ballot from the comfort of your home? Voting By Mail has never been easier! Follow the link below to learn how to request a mail-in ballot or join the Permanent Vote By Mail Roster.

Click here to learn about Voting By Mail

Looking to vote before Election Day? Early Voting locations are available in all 50 Wards of Chicago for your convenience. Click the link below to find out where and when you can Vote Early.

Click here for early voting locations and hours

Ensuring an inclusive voting experience for everyone is our priority. Learn about accessible voting options, assistance, and facilities available for voters with disabilities by clicking the link below.

Click here for information on accessibility and voting

Want to know which candidates will be elected for the upcoming November 5, 2024 Presidential General Election?

Click here to explore!
